title: Is the league community really that shit?
body:
You give someone advice you are flamed. 
You tell someone theyre doing something wrong you are just flaming them. 
You criticize the playstyle of a player you are reported for negative attitude. 
You come with facts and reasoning and you are apparently still wrong. 

Is the leagues community really full of entitled little kids? Or is there anyone out there that isn't completly mentally r%%%%%ed?

replies.body: Personally I like to do a long line of coke before each game, just to put me on an even footing conversation-wise.
The league community is pretty much complete shit. Most of the people that play this think they are untouchable and tend to be around the age of 16.

on top of it all any "negative attitude" report, justified or not usually results in chat restriction now, the only game in the past few weeks ive gotten reported in was telling my "support" yorick "Hey man, can you stop taking my cs, I'm bad enough at farming without your help" him and his duo buddy jump on me for the rest of the game, i mute them both, get reported negative attitude, next day or so i log in, and im chat restricted 26 games.....FIX YOUR SYSTEM RIOT! BRING BACK THE TRIBUNAL!

IKR. I just got a Ashe supporting because she didn't get her lane and a Xerath who is nothing but tunnel visioning the entire game. If you do not take it up the ass they're onto you. Furthermore premades are also fucking terrible in that regard.

Most of the players of LOL have this thought that they are the best at the game. People don't want to think that they are in the wrong, or that they are not as good as they thing they are. This is were all these toxic players come form in game. Also when you can hide behind a screen and keyboard.
It has had the reputation of the worst community in modern gaming, second to none, since 2010 at LEAST. Are you really this ignorant? Are you also building AP Urgot?
I don't even know  what you are trying to say. o.O {{champion:6}}

I am saying that if you made a list of games with toxic communities, being ranked by the games with the most toxic players, League of Legends is #1 every time, against any game, and has been since the year 2010 (and maybe before, I don't know). In the past, the media focused on games like Halo because of how people treated each other in multiplayer. League of Legends has surpassed that community in toxicity.

My last bit is wondering how you are so unaware of this fact that you're bewildered by the toxicity in the community, like putting your hand in a fire and being surprised you were burned, and then I insulted your intelligence by implying if you were unaware of that, I'd expect you to build AP on Urgot and think it was a good build.

"Toxic" is the word used by the players I'm talking about. Those entitled little fuckwits that brand any sort of other opinion, criticism and generall chatting as flaming. I'm really unaware that 90% of this community has a maturity level of fartjoke.
It's completely full of entitled little kids. They are all very sad inside.

Every big community should have people like that. There are quite a lot of those types of people on league, but most of the time it could just be solved by always playing with your friends or Team Builder 24/7. ;) Just ignore any flamers or ragers, and hit that report button later... ofc ignoring isn't that easy.... ;_;
Well that is my problem. Dealing with entitled shits is apparently reportable. It is kinda stupid that Riot even enforces the way of acting like a todler, because there are no consequences.
I made a thread about this loooong ago about how league is filled with nothing but god complexes. Sadly I don't think we can help those people.
